00053 template<int t_pow, bool t_take_root = false>
00054 class LMetric
00055 {
00056  public:
00057   /***
00058    * Default constructor does nothing, but is required to satisfy the Kernel
00059    * policy.
00060    */
00061   LMetric() { }

00067   static double Evaluate(const VecType& a, const VecType& b);
